IO: input-output (READ, WRITE)        IFLW: inflows  (inbound  data)
+ MANI: manipulation (COMPUTE, MOVE)    + OFLW: outflows (outbound data)
+ CALL: CALL (& outline PERFORM)        + FANI: fan-in   (inbound  CALLs)
+  OSS: open source software            + FANO: fan-out  (outbound CALLs)
+  NET: internet (GET, POST, PUT)       =   EC: external complexity
=   IC: internal complexity                 AC: architecture complexity = IC+EC
